Authors/editors: Public comment is complete. Please respond to comments in the tracker, or this tracker, or via updates to your document. Once completed, set the tracker back to Greg Newby, and we'll proceed with the next step.
Greg

entry.title: Editor - document #166: Data Format Description Language (DFDL) v1.0 Experience Document 3
entry.content:
Dear Michael,

    Thanks for this submission. The document you uploaded has "track changes" throughout. Would you please also submit a clean version? I don't want to "accept all" and risk making errors in the final version.

    Once that's done, we'll publish as GFD-E.216.
    - Greg Newby

entry.title: Editor - document #166: Data Format Description Language (DFDL) v1.0 Experience Document 3
entry.content:

With changes accepted and change tracking off.

entry.title: Editor - document #166: Data Format Description Language (DFDL) v1.0 Experience Document 3
entry.content:
• Status changed from author action to to be published
  • Assignee changed from David Martin to Andre Merzky

Thanks, Mike. This looks fine, and is ready for publication. I'm setting ownership to Andre to process this and get it online, and then I'll announce it.

Thanks and congratulations to you and the group for this document.
- Greg
